price: 7. Wuxuu Alle ku dhigay shaabbad daboosha quluubtooda iyo maqalkooda, araggoodana waxaa ku rogan Caad4.  Waxayna leeyihiin cadaab weyn.
arabic: خَتَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَعَلَىٰ سَمۡعِهِمۡۖ وَعَلَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡ غِشَٰوَةٞۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
footnotes: 4. Caad u diida qaadashada hanuunka. Arrintannina waxaa u sabab ah kibirkooda iyo ku madax adeyggooda denbiyada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: khatama al-lahu ʿalā qulūbihim waʿalā samʿihim waʿalā abṣārihim ghishāwatun walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
